N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 47.2 - Finding of fact

State Regulations

The board finds that the use of transparent glass doors and
fixed adjacent transparent glass sidelights in construction and remodeling of
buildings or other structures has increased to such an extent that accidental
injuries and deaths have occurred because of persons walking or falling into
such transparent glass doors and fixed adjacent transparent glass sidelights, and that regulations in regard to marking and construction thereof are required
for the protection of persons frequenting any area, building or structure where
such transparent glass doors and sidelights are located. Notes
